name: Maylene and the Sons of Disaster
description:
'''Maylene and the Sons of Disaster''' is an American [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band from [[Birmingham, Alabama]]. The group was founded in 2004, shortly after vocalist [[Dallas Taylor (vocalist)|Dallas Taylor]]'s departure from [[Underoath]] in 2003. Maylene and the Sons of Disaster signed to [[Mono Vs Stereo]] and released their [[Maylene & The Sons of Disaster (album)|self-titled debut album]].

The band name and concept are based on the legend of the criminal gang of [[Ma Barker]] and her sons, noting that "evil lifestyles will be met with divine justice".

In 2025, Brian Rolli of ''[[Loudwire]]'' included the band in his list of "five 2000s metalcore bands that should've been bigger".
